Uses of Interface
com.googlecode.transloader.clone.CloningStrategy

Packages that use CloningStrategy
com.googlecode.transloader   
com.googlecode.transloader.clone

Uses of CloningStrategy in com.googlecode.transloader
 

Constructors in com.googlecode.transloader with parameters of type CloningStrategy
DefaultTransloader(CloningStrategy cloningStrategy)
          Contructs a new Transloader to produce wrappers, the ObjectWrappers being configured with the given CloningStrategy.
ObjectWrapper(Object objectToWrap, CloningStrategy cloningStrategy)
          Constructs a new ObjectWrapper around the given object, which will use the given CloningStrategy when required.
 

Uses of CloningStrategy in com.googlecode.transloader.clone
 

Classes in com.googlecode.transloader.clone that implement CloningStrategy
 class SerializationCloningStrategy
          A CloningStrategy that uses Java Serialization as its mechanism.
 

Fields in com.googlecode.transloader.clone declared as CloningStrategy
static CloningStrategy CloningStrategy.MAXIMAL
          The implementation which clones every Object in the given object graph.
static CloningStrategy CloningStrategy.MINIMAL
          The implementation which clones as little as possible to make the given object graph use Classes that are the same as those that would be loaded through the given ClassLoader.
 

Uses of CloningStrategy in com.googlecode.transloader.clone.reflect
 

Classes in com.googlecode.transloader.clone.reflect that implement CloningStrategy
 class ReflectionCloningStrategy
          A CloningStrategy that uses Java Reflection as its mechanism.
 

Constructors in com.googlecode.transloader.clone.reflect with parameters of type CloningStrategy
ReflectionCloningStrategy(CloningDecisionStrategy cloningDecisionStrategy, InstantiationStrategy instantiator, CloningStrategy fallbackCloningStrategy)
          Contructs a new ReflectionCloningStrategy with its dependencies injected.
